item.title: did I run my migrations?
item.description: did I run my migrations? Today I had an error message driving me crazy: method_missing': undefined method export_format' for XXX model You see, our model is a gem itself, because it is shared by several projects. When we have something in the schema that is not in the database, that is the error we get. Now, I knew this error from previous executions, but my model was in synch with the DB.
